name: The Future is For Sale Part I
description:
Throughout my drawing / illustration practice, I have been interested in creating a fantastical dystopian themed cities. This illustration have pushed me towards a more realistic representation of what I believe the near future might be, which is no different from where we are currently. 
A piece of full color digital illustration displayed in a way that an advertisement would, a glowing billboard, a side bar, a banner. Which from a distance may seem like a happy idealistic city scape, that promises you a better life, but as you get a closer look, you start noticing all the accumulation of rubbish, cars, motorbikes, unsold properties, abandoned structures, and the absence of human and culture. An unliveable habitat.
